desc.p: Specifies the total number writes happening in the job.
The key used to identify the different records maintained on this file. The format of the ID is PROCESS.NAME-JOB.NAME.
Identifies the total number of records/contracts that was processed.
1-12 numeric characters.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
Specifies the fastest single throughput.
The name of the job that was processed.
1-32 type A (alphanumeric) characters.
The time taken to run the job. (I.e., SELECT.TIME + (END.TIME - START.TIME) in JOB.TIMES record)
System maintained.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
Indicates the processing (value -1) or elimination (value -2) of the incoming keys.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Indicates whether the job is set as .NTX in the PGM.FILE. Accepts 'Y' or 'N'. N indicates that the job is set as .NTX in PGM.FILE
Identifies the actual process name / routine name that executed this job.
Usually it will be BATCH.JOB.CONTROL.
1-32 type A (alphanumeric) characters.
Provides the first 35 characters of the CONTROL.LIST value.
Specifies the number of lock collisions during the whole job.
The time the job was ended/completed/finished.
System maintained.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
Indicates the average response time per transaction rounded to three decimal places.

The type of selection requested within BBL. What the select routine had passed as to whether it is a full select or filtered select or command being passed. Valid values are ALL,CRITERIA,FILTER and PREDEFINED.
Indicates the time the SELECT part of the job started.
Current service name can be fethched from here.
The Actual select statement used in the .SELECT routine
Specifies the no.of agents used to run this job
Indicates the date on which the job was last run. (I.e., bank date).
System maintained.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
Specifies the number of records that were bulked in list file during the selection of this job.
Specifies the number of contracts completed processing.
Indicates the time taken to do the SELECT
Identifies the number of records processed per minute. (calculated as: keys processed / elapsed time * 60)
1-7 numeric characters.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
The time job was started.
System maintained.
Fields BATCH.DATE to THROUGHPUT form a related multi value set.
Indicates whether CACHE.OFF is set as null.
Accepts 'Y' or 'N'.
Y indicates that CACHE.OFF is set as null.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
